sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnmtgplacemanage ( mtgrum_id , mtgrum_nm , opn_begin_tm , opn_end_tm , aceptnc_posbl_nmpr , lc_se , lc_detail , atch_file_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #mtgrumId# , #mtgrumNm# , #opnBeginTm# , #opnEndTm# , #aceptncPosblNmpr# , #lcSe# , #lcDetail# , #atchFileId# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnmtgplacemanage SET mtgrum_id = #mtgrumId# , mtgrum_nm = #mtgrumNm# , opn_begin_tm = #opnBeginTm# , opn_end_tm = #opnEndTm# , aceptnc_posbl_nmpr = #aceptncPosblNmpr# , lc_se = #lcSe# , lc_detail = #lcDetail# , atch_file_id = #atchFileId# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND mtgrum_id = #mtgrumId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnmtgplacemanage WHERE 1 = 1 AND mtgrum_id = #mtgrumId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT mtgrum_id , mtgrum_nm , opn_begin_tm , opn_end_tm , aceptnc_posbl_nmpr , lc_se , lc_detail , atch_file_id , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNMTGPLACEMANAGE WHERE mtgrum_id = #mtgrumId#

SELECT A.MTGRUM_ID , A.MTGRUM_NM , A.OPN_BEGIN_TM , A.OPN_END_TM , A.ACEPTNC_POSBL_NMPR , A.LC_SE , A.LC_DETAIL , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT MTGRUM_ID , MTGRUM_NM , OPN_BEGIN_TM , OPN_END_TM , ACEPTNC_POSBL_NMPR , LC_SE , LC_DETAIL , ATCH_FILE_ID , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNMTGPLACEMANAGE WHERE 1=1
MTGRUM_ID = #searchKeyword#
MTGRUM_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY MTGRUM_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNMTGPLACEMANAGE WHERE 1=1
MTGRUM_ID = #searchKeyword#
MTGRUM_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
